mapper.select: SELECT book.*,contents.article_id as fcid,contents.title as ftitle,buser.avatar as authorAvatar FROM edu_technology_book book LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * from edu_book_contents order by sortcontent ASC LIMIT 1) as contents ON book.id=contents.book_id LEFT OUTER JOIN red_class_user buser on book.auid = buser.id order by view_count DESC LIMIT #{size}
